name: Ultimate Runner III
description:
Ultimate Runner III is an infinite runner with surprising, challenging glitches! Try to survive those game-breaking glitches as long as you can!

Developed for Train Jam 2017. New glitches may be added later.

Warning: If you are subject to seizures, you might want to avoid playing Ultimate Runner III. The authors decline all and any responsibility if something bad happens to you while playing this game.

Credits:

  • Design: Alexandre Ultré
  • Code: Daniel Jung
  • Visuals: Jacob Goldfarb
  • Sounds: Akash Thakkar
